resources.string: Sign-up with Email has been discontinued for new users. Users who have signed-up with Email can still login.
Google / Facebook don’t give us your password or any personal information except your email. It is totally safe.
You get a referral code when your friend invites you. Otherwise please skip this step.
Please use your Google/Facebook\naccount to sign-up/login.

Your friends should download the app using the link only and complete registration process. This offer is valid for first time install only.

For each friend using your link, you will get 3 days free (he will get 3 days free too).

Free subscription will be added automatically to your accounts. Check updated subscription end date in 'My Profile' menu.
Please install the app from Google Play Store.
Your device time and date seems to be incorrect. Please correct the time and date and try again.
Free trial is valid once per device, which has already been taken on this device. You will need to purchase a subscription plan from Buy menu to continue.
Please install the latest version of the app.
Free trial is not available for Secondary Android accounts. You will need to buy a subscription plan.
You can change device only 3 times. Pending subscription will be renewed on the new device. Continue ?
Unable to acquire license. Please try later.
Would you like to Download or Delete the entire chapter ?
Visual Physics can help you with fast learning and revision of concepts (Theory) and practice of important problems (Solved Problems) for JEE Main.
Visual Physics can help you with in-depth learning of concepts (Theory) and techniques to solve problems faster (Solved Problems) for JEE Main.
Please focus on Theory section of each and every chapter, to get in-depth understading of concepts and basic applications for JEE Main.
Please focus on Theory section of each and every chapter, to get in-depth understading of concepts and basic applications for JEE Main.
Visual Physics can help you with fast learning and revision of concepts (Theory) and practice of important problems (Solved Problems) for JEE Main & Advanced.
Visual Physics can help you with in-depth learning of concepts (Theory) and techniques to solve problems faster (Solved Problems) for JEE Main & Advanced.
Please focus on Theory section of each and every chapter, to get in-depth understading of concepts and basic applications for JEE Main & Advanced.
Please focus on Theory section of each and every chapter, to get in-depth understading of concepts and basic applications for JEE Main & Advanced.
Visual Physics can help you with fast learning and revision of concepts (Theory) and practice of important problems (Solved Problems) for NEET / AIIMS.
Visual Physics can help you with in-depth learning of concepts (Theory) and techniques to solve problems faster (Solved Problems) for NEET / AIIMS.
Please focus on Theory section of each and every chapter, to get in-depth understading of concepts and basic applications for NEET / AIIMS.

Visual Physics can help students learn better with ample visualisation, practice selected solved problems and discuss their doubts with subject experts.
Visual Physics can help you learn & teach better with ample visualisation, which we strive to provide as a teacher.
Visual Physics can help you learn the basic as well as advanced level physics easily with powerful visualisation.
